summary: Rats, Cats, Dogs, Rabbits, Turtles, Beavers and Raccoons invaded Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]Pets Kingdom [/size][/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b] Version 3.5 (Wild animals + Companions) [/b][/color]


[i]Rats, Cats, Dogs, Rabbits, Turtles, Beavers and Raccoons invaded Skyrim ! [/i] [color=#ff0000]DLC Dawnguard Required for the versions 3.1.1 and 3.5 [/color] (NO DLC for the "old" version 3.0.1)


This mod is a merging of my mods:


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82166/?]Beavers and Raccoons of Skyrim [/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72883/?]Rabbits Kingdom [/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73752/?]Dogs Kingdom [/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72716/?]Rats Kingdom [/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72329/?]Cats Kingdom [/url]


[color=#ff0000][b][i][size=4]WARNING: If you install Pets Kingdom, you must uninstall these mods ![/size][/i][/b][/color]


[color=#00ff00]In the Miscellaneous files, you have an "Esp for Pets Kingdom 3.5 without Turtles" [/color]


If you want to be accompanied by SEVERAL companions, it is possible with the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url]

With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52871/?] Sokco's Guild Starter [/url] you can recruited up to 10 guild members in your home (aka headquarters)

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012107105116616015484326.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012107105116616015484326.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=4]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/size][/color]


You must put this mod at the bottom of the list, when you launch the game for that the cats don't walk with sounds like mammoths or elephants

No Favor option (in the conversation box) with the dogs (not the Huskies or the German Shepherds)

You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks, or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

The turtle has its lower jaw that advances slightly, and moves making a sound of ... mammoth !

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012107285116616015484337.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012107285116616015484337.jpg[/img][/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/76r2Z5X.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4][i]CATS[/i][/size][/b][/color]

Wild (non hostile) cats and Companions invaded [color=#ff0000]Whiterun[/color], [color=#ff0000]Solitude[/color] and [color=#ff0000]Riften[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/MGhDGl8.gif[/img]

New House Cats (Companions) in Breezehome (1), Honeyside (1) and Proudspire Manor (2)

[size=4][b][color=#ff0000][i]DOGS[/i][/color][/b][/size]

Wild dogs (34) and Companions (21) invaded [color=#ff0000]Morthal[/color], [color=#ff0000]Dragon Bridge[/color], [color=#ff0000]Dawnstar[/color], [color=#ff0000]Karthwasten[/color] and [color=#ff0000]Helgen[/color] (surroundings)

New Huskies (13) and German Shepherds (3) near [color=#ff0000]Solitude[/color] (also in the Blue Palace), [color=#ff0000]Markath[/color] (also in the Understone Keep), [color=#ff0000]Riften[/color] (also in the Mistveil Keep), [color=#ff0000]Windhelm[/color] (also in the Palace of the Kings), [color=#ff0000]Whiterun[/color] (also in the Dragonsreach Great porch and Breezehome)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/IbjdLGN.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4][i]RATS[/i][/size][/b][/color]

Wild (non hostile) rats (298), Companions (32) invaded [color=#ff0000]Markath[/color] with the [color=#00ff00]Grey Breed[/color] (Also in the Cidhna Mine), [color=#ff0000]Windhelm[/color] with the [color=#00ff00]Albinos Breed[/color] (Also in the Hall of the Dead), [color=#ff0000] Ivarstead [/color] with the [color=#00ff00]Brown Breed[/color] (Also in Shroud Hearth Barrow -Nordic Ruin-), [color=#ff0000]Shor's Stone[/color] with the [color=#00ff00]Light Brown Breed[/color] (Also in Redbelly Mine), and [color=#ff0000] Riften [/color] with the [color=#00ff00]Black Breed[/color] (Essentially in the Ratway)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/aroeBpK.gif[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/XWVRpoj.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4][i]RABBITS[/i][/size][/b][/color]

Wild rabbits (72) and Companions (18) invaded [color=#ff0000]Falkreath[/color] and [color=#ff0000]Rorikstead[/color]

You have also the [color=#00ff00] Kanra’s [/color] followers (23) IN (Alvor and Sigrid's House - Sven and Hilde's House - Sleeping Giant Inn) and NEAR [color=#ff0000] Riverwood [/color]

And 5 Bunny Toys in Riverwood (Merchants: Lucan Valerius - Orgnar + in the Alvor and Sigrid's House + in the Sven and Hilde's House + in the Sleeping Giant Inn)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/OkFriCq.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4][i]RACCOONS and BEAVERS[/i][/size][/b][/color]

Adds Beavers and Raccoons along the Streams/Rivers/Lakes of Skyrim, and around: Wild (38 Beavers + 24 Raccoons) + Companions/Followers (16 Beavers + 12 Raccoons)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/dU9zKkx.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4][i]TURTLE[/i][/size][/b][/color] (ARMIES of TURTLES)

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs of Turtles with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of Turtles (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these Turtles eggs, simply bring any “ Turtle Egg ” (found with some [color=#00ff00]Merchants in Falkreath [/color]: [i][b]Volga Vinicia of the Dead Man's Drink, Solaf of the Gray Pine Goods, Zaria of the Grave Concoctions[/b][/i]) to a forge and create the "Incubated Turtle Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Turtle . The Turtle follow you.

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs

You have also (7) Wild Turtles in Falkreath

[img]https://i.imgur.com/zKCagjz.jpg[/img]


[color=#ff0000][size=4]CREDITS[/size][/color]


[color=#ff0000]HISSSSA[/color] for the Meshes/textures of these cats (with some sounds) in his mod

[url=http://ux.getuploader.com/issssaxmod002/download/3/HS-Cat+Base+for+Skyrim+0.2.7z]hs-cat[/url]

[url=http://hissssa.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/]Blog of Hissssa [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Testiger2 and XP32[/color] for the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/? ]Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix [/url] ("Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder -testiger2-")

[color=#ff0000] gothic2392/ 530gothic25 [/color] for the meshes/textures of Beaver, Raccoon, in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37999/?] Skyrim Wildlife Overhaul [/url] (“give me credit at least”)

[color=#ff0000]KANRAx2[/color] with his Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38138/?]yurufuwa rabbit [/url] ("Modders resources and tutorials") for the meshes and the textures of the rabbits, and the mod [url=http://skyrimshot.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-49.html]Kanra Follower [/url]+ [url=http://rim-rim-fox.tumblr.com/post/77800883762/kanrafollower-addon-2] kanrafollower_addon [/url]; [url=http://sala-mitzha.tumblr.com/] Blog of Kanra/Sala mitzha [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Garnet/flintone[/color] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65693/?]Bunny Toys [/url]

[color=#ff0000]HISSSSA[/color] for the Meshes/textures of these dogs in his mod

[url=http://ux.getuploader.com/issssaxmod002/download/4/HS-Dog-Base+v0.2.7z]hs-dog [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Aenkill [/color] for the textures of the different colors of Huskies (Brown,Grey,Alternative Grey,Pale Brown,Dark Brown,Black) in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36021/?] Husky HD Recolor - Bran and Sceolang replacer [/url]("You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me") (+ the team: MangoMonkey "Unique Huskies Patch" and fix for "No Armors" mod; Edg3k tongue texture; Proxe -blenderartists.org- eye texture base).[color=#ff0000] PlagueHush [/color] for the retexture of the mod of Aenkill [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63598/?] Husky 2k Variants - An Automatic Variants Package [/url] "With Aenkill's permission I've repaired the alpha channel holes in the original textures, darkened the glowing white of the husky undercoat to something a little more realistic (and that works better with ENBs)" ("Just give us both credit")

[color=#ff0000]cansu[/color] for the texture of the German Shepherd in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37769//?]GermanShepherd[/url] ("you can use it anyway you like")

The mesh of the new German Shepherd is from [color=#ff0000] kgleaton01 [/color] in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29810/?] Judah Working Dog [/url]

[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba[/color] for the mesh of the New Armored Husky (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

[color=#ff0000]HISSSSA[/color] for the Meshes/textures of these rats in his mod

[url=http://ux.getuploader.com/hissssaxmod001/download/25/HS-Rat-resource0.1.7z] hs-rat [/url] with a [url=http://ux.getuploader.com/hissssaxmod001/download/26/HS-Rat-resource0.1b-patch.7z] patch [/url]

[color=#ff0000] SpikeDragonLord and jboyd4 [/color] for the Turtle in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76203/?] Beasts of Tamriel [/url] (« you can use it but only if its in one of your pre-existing mods »)

[color=#ff0000] Mihail Romanov [/color]for the House Cat in [url=https://old.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88386/?] House Cats- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - pets- witcher) [/url] (Also CD PROJEKT RED for the Witcher and LorSakyamuni to convert the cat)

Free sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] - [url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] - [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url] - [url=http://www.xeno-canto.org/]xeno-canto[/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/XnC0F4D.gif[/img]

[b]Video with Pets Kingdom SE [/b]([color=#00ff00]Mod 1[/color]): (Thanks to S.Silin/Ikari)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]Gcct-QOGMXs[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]iA2IXLbu7Co[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[b]Video with the Pets [/b]([color=#00ff00]Cats/Rats/Dogs/Rabbits - Kingdom[/color]):

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]BM9hcp2Drb4[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000] The pets of my mod are beautiful in this video from 2’53’’ to 4’23’’[/color] (Thanks to laiilaiiheii /Just Call Me Frosty)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]N5_G_Lf1swo[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
author: gg77

files.name: Pets Kingdom 3.0.1 WITH MOUNTS. NO DLC needed
Pets Kingdom 3.1.1. DLC DAWNGUARD REQUIRED
files.fileName: Pets Kingdom 3.1.1 NO MOUNTS. DLC DAWNGUARD REQUIRED-53078-3-1-1.7z

files.name: Pets Kingdom 3.5. DLC DAWNGUARD REQUIRED
files.fileName: Pets Kingdom 3.5 NO MOUNTS. DLC DAWNGUARD REQUIRED-53078-3-5.7z
files.changelogHtml:
New in Version 3.5: Adds House Cats + Turtle

New in Version 3.1.1: Adds Beavers + Raccoons + new Dogs. The DLC Dawnguard is now required

New in Version 3.0: New sounds for Followers (Rats, Rabbits, Kanras) + Followers "at rest" can now to move (Rabbits, Kanras, Cats)

New in Version 2.5.6: Cleaned with TesVEdit

New in Version 2.5.5: Reduced sound volume for cats followers + minor changes

New in Version 2.5.3: Corrections with a few place names

New in Version 2.5.2: The cats footsteps are now normally loud and no predator-like breathing-sound (Thanks to “mikraemer”: “I know this affects the real sabrecats as well, but it’s not a big problem IMO, cause if you came across sabrecats in the wilderness they usually attack you immediatly, so the sabrecat-attack-sounds gets played and not the walking-sounds, so you don't miss them”)

New in Version 2.5: improved meshes for some rats + a new companion Rat in the Mistveil Keep (Riften)

New in Version 2.4.1: Adds an "Elder Scroll" ("Book") to a follower Rat in the Understone Keep

New in Version 2.4: Adds 5 new followers rats + now the little rats can run

New in Version 2.3: Adds a new breed of Rats (light brown) in Shor’s Stone (also in Redbelly Mine) + some followers Rats (in Understone Keep, the Mistveil Keep and the Palace of the Kings)

New in Version 2.1: Increased the size of the Wild/Followers Rabbits + The Mounts Rats are now "Essential" ! + A bug fixed (?) with a follower Kanra in Riverwood

New in Version 2.0: Adds Kanra’s followers (21) and mounts (3) near the south gate of Riverwood

New in version 1.2.2: Adds Brown Rats in Shroud hearth Barrow (Nordic Ruin near Ivarstead): 34 wild rats + 4 Followers + All the locations with the pets are in English!

New in the Version 1.2: Minor changes + Adds New Dogs: 6 Wild dogs + 5 Followers + 3 Mounts in Dragonbridge

New in the Version 1.1: Adds Two New Breeds of Rats (Black in Riften + Brown in Ivarstead) with 53 Wild rats/4 Followers/1 Mount for the black breed (essentially in the Riften Ratway); 29 Wild rats/4 Followers/1 Mount for the brown breed; and also for the grey breed: 61 wild rats in the Cidhna Mine (Markath) and 17 wild rats for the white breed in the Windhelm Hall of the Dead

Version 1.0:

RATS: Wild rats (77), Companions (10) and Mounts (2) Invaded Markath (Grey breed) and Windhelm (White breed)

RABBITS: Wild rabbits (72), Companions (18) and Mounts (18) invaded Falkreath and Rorikstead

CATS: Wild (non hostile) cats (49), Companions (44) and Mounts (10) invaded Whiterun, Solitude and Riften

DOGS: Wild dogs (15), Companions (10) and Mounts (9) invaded Morthal and Dawnstar
